thread.title: The 47 Most WTF Celebrity Moments Of 2016
thread.title_full: The 47 Most WTF Celebrity Moments Of 2016

author: Kimberley Dadds
title: The 47 Most WTF Celebrity Moments Of 2016
text:
Yep, that was in 2016. Seems like a lifetime ago, right? ID: 10170400 2. Taylor Swift started dating Tom Hiddleston straight after splitting from Calvin Harris, which was pretty WTF anyway. But then things moved insanely quickly. Here they are meeting Tom‚Äôs mother after just NINE DAYS of dating. View this image ‚Ä∫ 
Goff Photos / / / FameFlynet.uk.com ID: 10170402 3. Then just over TWO WEEKS after they started going out, Tom declared his love for Taylor on a T-shirt for the world to see. View this image ‚Ä∫ 
Ryan Turgeon / Ryan Turgeon / Splash News ID: 10205661 View this image ‚Ä∫ 
Ryan Turgeon / Splash News ID: 10205669 4. He wore it during her 4th July party, which, as usual, included her billions of celeb friends. Including Ryan Reynolds, and this photo was born. Loading View on Instagram 
Instagram: @britmaack ID: 10205670 You can tell this wasn't his idea. You can tell he thinks this was a dick move. Ryan Reynolds always knows.
‚Äî Ian Woodbyrne (@ian_woodbyrne) ID: 10170465 ‚ÄúI now know what to call the Deadpool sequel: Deadpool: DeadInside.‚Äù - Ryan Reynolds‚Äô internal monologue
‚Äî A-A-Ron Swanson (@coucouaaron) ID: 10205672 5. Also, there was a time when Tayvin got pretty damn messy post breakup. View this image ‚Ä∫ 
Twitter: @tayvinswarris ID: 10247620 Here‚Äôs the summary: Taylor and Calvin broke up; things were totally fine. Some shit happened, they deleted every pic of each other, Taylor started her romantic world tour with Tom Hiddleston, and then Calvin Harris went off on Taylor on Twitter. ID: 10247621 6. It happened when it was revealed Taylor actually wrote ‚ÄúThis Is What You Came For‚Äù, Calvin‚Äôs song with Rihanna. Video available at: https://youtube.com/watch?v=kOkQ4T5WO9E . youtube.com Calvin tweeted a string of messages which read: ‚ÄúShe sings on a little bit of it too üôÉ Amazing lyric writer and she smashed it as usual. I wrote the music, produced the song, arranged it and cut the vocals though. And initially she wanted it kept secret, hence the pseudonym. Hurtful to me at this point that her and her team would go so far out of their way to try and make ME look bad at this stage though ü§î I figure if you‚Äôre happy in your new relationship you should focus on that instead of trying to tear your ex bf down for something to do. I know you‚Äôre off tour and you need someone new to try and bury like Katy ETC but I‚Äôm not that guy, sorry. I won‚Äôt allow it.‚Äù
That was definitely a Katy Perry dig, right?! We‚Äôd explain that one, but that was so 2015.
ID: 10247624 And it appeared like Katy Perry maybe, could have possibly responded with a GIF. 
‚Äî KATY PERRY (@katyperry) ID: 10247628 Get the full lowdown here people. ID: 10247630 7. It was also the year there was a WHOLE lot of Kanye and Taylor beef. It started when Kanye released a song called ‚ÄúFamous‚Äù with the lyrics ‚ÄúI think that me and Taylor might still have sex / I made that bitch famous‚Äù. This caused a LOT of drama. View this image ‚Ä∫ 
Getty Images ID: 10170389 Basically Taylor claimed that she never approved the lyrics, and warned Kanye not to release it. View this image ‚Ä∫ 
Mark Davis / Getty Images Her publicist told BuzzFeed at the time: ‚ÄúKanye did not call for approval, but to ask Taylor to release his single ‚ÄòFamous‚Äô on her Twitter account. She declined and cautioned him about releasing a song with such a strong misogynistic message. Taylor was never made aware of the actual lyric, ‚ÄòI made that bitch famous.‚Äô‚Äù
ID: 10212569 8. Then there was a lot of back and forth. Kanye said she definitely heard and loved it, Kim K backed him up in her GQ interview . ID: 10212592 3rd thing I called Taylor and had a hour long convo with her about the line and she thought it was funny and gave her blessings
‚Äî KANYE WEST (@kanyewest) ID: 10212573 9. THEN SHIT GOT TOTALLY MESSY. Kim decided to upload the video of the phone call between Kanye and Taylor to Snapchat. We‚Äôre still not over it tbh. Loading View on Instagram 
instagram.com ID: 10170390 Loading View on Instagram 
Instagram: @kimksnapchats ID: 10212578 10. Anyway, then Taylor put this on Instagram following Kim‚Äôs snapchat reveal. Loading View on Instagram 
Instagram: @taylorswift ID: 10212580 BUT THAT WASN‚ÄôT ALL. ID: 10212719 11. A shit load of other celebs got involved, including Chlo√´ Moretz, who dubbed the whole thing ‚Äúpetulant and unimportant‚Äù. Everyone in this industry needs to get their heads out of a hole and look around to realize what's ACTUALLY happening in the REAL world
‚Äî Chlo√´ Grace Moretz (@ChloeGMoretz) ID: 10212739 Stop wasting your voice on something so petulant and unimportant
‚Äî Chlo√´ Grace Moretz (@ChloeGMoretz) ID: 10212769 12. So of course Khloe Kardashian got involved, and it ended up being Khloe vs Chlo√´ . Kim‚Äôs sister tweeted this, alongside a picture of a girl that looked like Moretz from the back with her swimming bottoms falling down and showing off her bare bottom. View this image ‚Ä∫ 
Twitter ID: 10170391 Which led to Chlo√´ hitting back with this. @khloekardashian fact check: first photo is me filming my movie Neighbors 2, the second photo is some girl who was wrongfully photographed
‚Äî Chlo√´ Grace Moretz (@ChloeGMoretz) ID: 10212796 13. Anyway, Ruby Rose weighed in etc etc. @ChloeGMoretz @0hbubbl3s @khloekardashian Yo Khloe I thought you were rad when I met you but this is awful and this is a 19 year old girl.
‚Äî Ruby Rose (@RubyRose) ID: 10212797 14. But it wasn‚Äôt all about Taylor. Lindsay Lohan debuted a new weird accent. Video available at: https://youtube.com/watch?v=ItCChreyTxA . youtube.com She said it‚Äôs a ‚Äúmixture of most of the languages I can understand or am trying to learn‚Äù.
ID: 10170417 15. And also shared numerous unexpected EU Referendum tweets. Like these. View this image ‚Ä∫ 
Twitter: @twitter.com/ ID: 10170415 View this image ‚Ä∫ 
Twitter: @twitter.com/ ID: 10212558 View this image ‚Ä∫ 
Twitter: @twitter.com/ ID: 10212561 Who knew she cared so much about British politics? ID: 10212562 16. Oh, also Kanye went to Trump Tower to hang out with Donald because that‚Äôs what a regular week day looks like in 2016 now. Apparently they just discussed ‚Äúlife‚Äù. View this image ‚Ä∫ 
Timothy A. Clary / AFP / Getty Images ‚ÄúWe‚Äôve been friends for a long time,‚Äù Trump told the media while posing for pictures. IDK.
ID: 10170396 17. Kim Kardashian decided to snapchat her way through a pregnancy scare. Because why not. Kim Kardashian / Snapchat
  ‚ÄúI‚Äôm legit in the airplane bathroom and I‚Äôm gonna take a pregnancy test, because I‚Äôm having a little bit of a scare,‚Äù she said in a video. ‚ÄúSo, no big deal.‚Äù
ID: 10206261 18. 2016 was also the year Nick Jonas revealed he once got high and had a boner at the Young Hollywood Awards. View this image ‚Ä∫ 
NBC ID: 10170384 View this image ‚Ä∫ 
NBC ID: 10204806 Please see Exhibit A. NBC 
  ID: 10204813 19. Heidi Klum dressed as six Heidi Klums for Halloween, as you do. View this image ‚Ä∫ 
Dimitrios Kambouris / Getty Images ID: 10170414 20. Then there was all the Blac Chyna/Rob Kardashian drama. We‚Äôre over the shock of them getting together. We think we‚Äôre even almost over them having a baby together and calling their daughter Dream Kardashian View this image ‚Ä∫ 
Snapchat ID: 10170397 21. But we‚Äôre not sure we‚Äôre over their relationship in early December . It‚Äôs a bit of a long story, but it started with a load of messages that appeared on Blac Chyna‚Äôs Instagram account. View this image ‚Ä∫ 
Instagram What followed was a long, long list of purported messages between Chyna and others, including one which allegedly tried to show her making plans to trademark the Kardashian name, while others badmouthed Rob. It‚Äôs important to note that we could never verify whether the messages were real or not.
ID: 10247594 22. But things got weirder just after that when Rob started posting on Snapchat claiming she‚Äôd walked out on him for Christmas with their baby. As he toured his empty home he said, ‚ÄúGot the Christmas tree all set up for Chyna and the baby, but they left me.‚Äù View this image ‚Ä∫ 
Instagram ID: 10247598 Oh, and to make matters worse she apparently left with all of the food from the house as well. ‚ÄúShe took all the Eggos. Man, all my Eggos,‚Äù he said as he showed viewers an empty fridge and pantry. ‚ÄúWhere‚Äôs my sugar? She took my sugar! She took my OPEN bag of my favorite chips!‚Äù Loading View on Instagram 
Instagram: @balleralert ID: 10247600 23. Then, because this wasn‚Äôt all weird enough, Rob started posting memes ‚Äî HONEST TO GOD, MEMES ‚Äî about the apparent breakup of his family. View this image ‚Ä∫ 
Instagram ID: 10247601 View this image ‚Ä∫ 
Instagram ID: 10247602 Anyway, you can read all the details here in full if you want to get totally up to speed. ID: 10247605 24. 2016 also saw Leonardo DiCaprio making out with Dame Maggie Smith at the BAFTAs. View this image ‚Ä∫ 
BBC One ID: 10170490 25. He also made this hilarious face when Lady Gaga brushed past him at the Golden Globes. vine.co ID: 10205825 Iconic. NBC
  ID: 10205834 26. But maybe the best Leo moment of all was when he took a selfie and was really impressed with himself. Loading View on Instagram 
instagram.com ID: 10170598 ‚ÄúWho is that fine gentleman?‚Äù View this image ‚Ä∫ 
instagram.com ID: 10212345 View this image ‚Ä∫ 
instagram.com ID: 10212367 View this image ‚Ä∫ 
instagram.com ID: 10212368 27. Oh, and this year, after 200 million years, Leo FINALLY won a goddamn Oscar. View this image ‚Ä∫ 
ABC ID: 10205806 Look how happy he was! View this image ‚Ä∫ 
ABC ID: 10205811 28. In more weird romance moments, Cheryl Cole and Liam Payne started dating. Loading View on Instagram 
instagram.com ID: 10170413 Which felt a bit WTF at first considering they met in 2008‚Ä¶ when he was 14 auditioning for The X Factor and she was 24 and the judge. vine.co ID: 10206040 But they are happy and expecting a baby now, yay! ID: 10206048 29. Also J-Lo and Drake rounded up the year by becoming a thing. Loading View on Instagram 
instagram.com ID: 10247568 Yep, really. Drake and Jennifer Lopez üëÄ
‚Äî Rap Direct (@RapDirect) ID: 10247584 30. Idris Elba was also rumoured to be sleeping with Madonna in another weird romance story of the year. Twitter: @reginamilfs 
  ID: 10206184 But he soon cleared that one up. Am I sleeping with Madonna? No motherfuckers... "Don't believe the Hype".
‚Äî Idris Elba (@idriselba) ID: 10206187 31. Meanwhile Madonna decided to expose a teen‚Äôs boob while performing on stage, because she‚Äôs Madonna. youtube.com 
  ID: 10206570 32. Channing Tatum lip synched to Beyonc√© and was scarily accurate. View this image ‚Ä∫ 
Spike / BuzzFeed ID: 10170421 33. Justin Bieber wandered around Amsterdam wearing this fake moustache. View this image ‚Ä∫ 
WENN ID: 10170451 ¬Ø\_(„ÉÑ)_/¬Ø V√≠deo de Justin disfar√ßado em Amsterd√£, Holanda (07/10) üòÇüòÇ
‚Äî Portal Bieber Brasil (@portalbiebersbr) ID: 10206296 34. Oh, and he also totally stacked it off the stage he was performing on and seemed to disappear into the ground. Loading View on Instagram 
instagram.com ID: 10170466 View this image ‚Ä∫ 
instagram.com ID: 10206332 35. In one of the biggest celeb stories of the year, Brangelina divorced out of the blue. View this image ‚Ä∫ 
Valery Hache / AFP / Getty Images RIP Brad Pitt and Angelina Jolie. ‚òπ
ID: 10170453 36. Harry Styles CHOPPED ALL HIS HAIR OFF. üì∏ | Another picture of Harry on set of Dunkirk.
‚Äî Harry Styles Updates (@BestDailyHarry) ID: 10170472 37. Usher decided to randomly post a nude to his Snapchat story and almost gave us a heart attack. Hide

ID: 10212276 40. Also, Katy Perry‚Äôs dog pooped on a phone and she put it on Instagram for all to see for some reason. You have been warned, don‚Äôt click if you don‚Äôt want to see poop. Hide

Instagram: @katyperry ID: 10170617 41. Stacey Dash made everything pretty awkward at the Oscars with this weird joke. View this image ‚Ä∫ 
ABC ID: 10170486 And had everyone like: That Stacey Dash fiasco had us like:
‚Äî Strong Young Thing (@SYT_MAG) ID: 10206936 42. Reese Witherspoon started selling a ‚ÄúWreath Witherspoon Dress‚Äù on her website. View this image ‚Ä∫ 
draperjames.com ID: 10170491 43. But Kim Kardashian of course went one further and started selling butt collage wrapping paper on hers. View this image ‚Ä∫ 
store.kimkardashianwest.com ID: 10170636 44. Gigi Hadid was picked up by a random dude and held in his grip for a few moments during Milan Fashion Week. Gigi defended herself when a man grabs her after the Max Mara show.
‚Äî Hadid News (@HadidNews) ID: 10170497 NOT OK!! ID: 10206986 So she elbowed him in the face to defend herself. Twitter: @HadidNews 
Twitter: @HadidNews 
  ID: 10206997 And gave us a lesson in how people should treat other human beings. and had EVERY RIGHT to defend myself. How dare that idiot thinks he has the right to man-handle a complete stranger. He ran quick tho üëäüèºüòèüê±
‚Äî Gigi Hadid (@GiGiHadid) ID: 10207001 45. When Mariah Carey posed in front of her humidifier like the Mariah Carey we know and love in this world. View this image ‚Ä∫ 
instagram.com ID: 10170599 46. Ciara revealed she hates her ex Future so much she refused to say his name during the Billboard Music Awards nominations. Ciara wouldn't say Future's name for the Billboard nominees but you engaged now üôÉ. Let that hurt go beloved.
‚Äî Stephen Dacres (@SRDtv) ID: 10170610 47. And Zayn Malik revealed an alien told him to leave One Direction. View this image ‚Ä∫ 
Universal Pictures / BuzzFeed ID: 10170635 He told Glamour about the first time he thought about leaving 1D:
Q: First time you realized you wanted to break off from 1D and go off on your own?
A: An alien spoke to me in a dream‚Ä¶.
ID: 10207141   
  More News About Taylor Swift, Kim Kardashian, Kanye West, Tom Hiddleston, Katy Perry, Drake, Mariah Carey Kimberley Dadds is the UK celebrity editor for BuzzFeed and is based in London.
